description: This source file implements functions related to a command object in the BroadWay Service Delivery System, specifically for the Slap Bmc2 Command Object. It defines the function SlapBmc2ComoGetCount which retrieves the count of CLI arguments associated with the request controller.

methods.name: SLAP_UINT32 SlapBmc2ComoGetCount(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the number of CLI arguments from the Bmc2 request controller object associated with this command object.
